text: what's up this is John Legend here
wishing everybody happy holidays I've
had a wonderful year without an album
with the roots called wake up if you
don't have any go get it was a part of
an incredible documentary film called
Waiting for Superman wrote a song called
shine for that film which is also
included on the album wake up I'm really
thankful for those things happening this
year and I'm looking forward to 2011
there's so much to do working on a new
album already going in the studio with
Kanye in a few days to really kickstart
that album and hope you all have a great
holiday so much we have to be grateful
for all of our families and all the
blessings that we receive so enjoy the
holiday I'm gonna be in Asia for the
holidays Thailand for Christmas Japan
for New Year's Eve a little bit
different it won't be a white Christmas
but it'll be a fun one but hopefully all
you have a good time too happy holidays
Merry Christmas Happy Hanukkah happy
Kwanzaa Happy New Year peace
